course_title: Exploring Fairness in Machine Learning for International Development
course_description: In an effort to build the capacity of the students and faculty on the topics of bias and fairness in machine learning (ML) and appropriate use of ML, the [MIT CITE](https://d-lab.mit.edu/research/mit-d-lab-cite) team developed capacity-building activities and material. This material covers content through four modules that an be integrated into existing courses over a one to two week period.
title: Course Metadata
